products.title: DaVinci Resolve 20 | Kling 3.0 Plugin
products.description: Plugin that allows users to generate Kling 3.0 videos directly within DaVinci Resolve 20. Seamlessly integrate AI-powered video generation into your editing and color grading workflow without leaving your timeline. Generate B-roll, visual effects, transitions, and more using natural language prompts.
products.requirements: DaVinci Resolve 20 or later, Kling API key (free tier available)
products.author: Kartel AI Team
products.installInstructions:
1. Extract the ZIP file to your DaVinci Resolve plugins folder
2. Restart DaVinci Resolve
3. Find Kling 3.0 in Workspace > Scripts
4. Enter your Kling API key to activate
products.changelog: Added support for Kling 3.0 API, improved rendering speed by 40%, new preset templates for common video styles
